field.name: FB_ENROLL_RESP_ID
field.description: Link to U_FB_FORM_RESPONSE_ID. When a kindergartner's registration data has been approved by a secretary, the id of the FormBuilder form response is inserted here. This field is used to determine if the Approve Enrollment link should appear red. This value should match the id of the most recent FormBuilder response for this student, meaning that the approved response is the most recent one. If there is an id in this field that does not match the most recent response id for the student, that response should be approved. If this field blank for the student, the response should also be approved.
